publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2833.2 Ms Wendy Alexander: Scotch Whisky Industry—As an amendment to motion (S1M-2833) in the name of Miss Annabel Goldie, leave out from first "notes" to end and insert "welcomes the Scottish Executive’s recognition of the importance of the Scotch whisky industry to the economy, the contribution that the industry makes to employment across Scotland and the Executive’s commitment to work with the industry as set out in A Toast to the Future – working together for Scotch Whisky." Supported by: Lewis Macdonald*
